show_name: anohana: The Flower We Saw That Day (TV)
other_title: Ano Hana: Ancora non conosciamo il nome del fiore che abbiamo visto quel giorno (Italian)
Ano Hi Mita Hana no Namae o Boku-tachi wa Mada Shiranai. (Japanese)
We Still Don't Know the Name of the Flower We Saw That Day.
あの日見た花の名前を僕達はまだ知らない。 (Japanese)
그날 본 꽃의 이름을 우리는 아직 모른다 (Korean)
plot: Five childhood friends grow apart after the death of Meiko Honma, close playmate of them all. Jinta Yadomi, leader of the group when they were kids, neglects high school and lives as a shut-in when he unexpectedly starts seeing the ghost of Meiko, who can only interact with him and no one else. She has returned to ask Jinta to fulfill the forgotten wish she made as a kid.
opening_theme: "Aoi Shiori" (青い栞; "Blue Bookmark") by Galileo Galilei (eps 1-10)
ending_theme: "Secret Base - Kimi ga Kureta Mono (10 years after Ver.)" (secret base 〜君がくれたもの〜 [10 years after Ver.]) by Ai Kayano, Haruka Tomatsu, and Saori Hayami (eps 1-10)
"Aoi Shiori" (青い栞; "Blue Bookmark") by Galileo Galilei (ep 11)
insert_song: "Secret Base - Kimi ga Kureta Mono (10 years after Ver.)" (secret base 〜君がくれたもの〜 [10 years after Ver.]) by Ai Kayano, Haruka Tomatsu, and Saori Hayami (ep 11)
